TopicTitle: How I get directly to the Mun.

Articles.Content:
I\'ve seen alot of videos and heard alot of 'it\'s inefficient' but I get to the Mun with no fuss and very little waste.

I figured I would share. Directly to the mun

Thank you for sharing this, it\'s very helpful.

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

...FINALLY. I KNOW HOW TO GET THE MOON. Thanks for posting this.

EDIT: Oops, Mun.

Nice. The only time I got to the Mun was by building something as tall as a level 3.4 Flagship, by KSP RP standards, put 3 Large Bertha engines on it, point towards the Mun, and prayed. Then, I made it. Then, a few seconds later, I realized parachutes don\'t work without air. Attached below is images of a replica.
Yea. I do it almost like that.

Nice. The only time I got to the Mun was by building something as tall as a level 3.4 Flagship, by KSP RP standards, put 3 Large Bertha engines on it, point towards the Mun, and prayed. Then, I made it. Then, a few seconds later, I realized parachutes don\'t work without air. Attached below is images of a replica.

Oh god dude, all those fins...

I understand your want for control, but putting that many fins so close together creates drag...

If you halved those fins you would get better speeds with a TINY loss of control.

Oh god dude, all those fins...

I understand your want for control, but putting that many fins so close together creates drag...

If you halved those fins you would get better speeds with a TINY loss of control.

Whatever, it still flew to the Mun! Even though the capsule was crushed by lack of parachute operation.
